title: KEEP GETTING BANNED WHY??
body: okay so I got banned a little bit ago and it was 14 day ban.. now everytime I make a new account and say anything even mildly toxic they issue another 14 day ban and don't even think about giving me chat restrict.. so does this mean I'm IP banned? I really would like an answer like ive put so much money and effort into my account I would just like to know if I'm IP banned or if I can keep playing plz help

replies.body: {{champion:267}} Locking this necro :)
Riot does not IP ban. If you can provide your recent chat logs we can help you figure out what may be causing the 14-day bans.
A better question you might want to ask yourself is why can't you change your behavior.
see not toxic enough for 14 day ban
Easily toxic enough for a 14-day ban. If you think this is an appropriate way to treat other people you have bigger problems than your league accounts being banned.

> [{quoted}](name=LE4GUE0FDR4VEN,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=WhUZz4jo,comment-id=000900000000,timestamp=2017-11-10T23:45:55.524+0000)
>
> <removed by moderation>

This even proves that your opinion on "I wasn't toxic enough for a ban" is wrong. Read your chatlog from a third person perspective and you may just see why you were reported and how it was considered toxic.

>so telling me I have bigger problems outside of league isn't toxic?  

First, use the full quote:

> If you think this is an appropriate way to treat other people you have bigger problems than your league accounts being banned.  

I do not know if you think calling people retards and telling them to kill themselves is appropriate behavior, that is why I said **If**. 

Second, given your reaction to people who are agreeing with Riot and saying you are toxic, I am going to go ahead and throw away that **if**. You really should rethink the life choices that got you to a point where you are telling strangers online to kill themselves because they hurt your feelings.

Tyler1 is also in the "ban on sight" category (IIRC). Any time an account is found out to be him, gone. If that is your measuring stick, I am sorry. You should find a better role model. Honestly, you continually telling others to inflict harm on themselves is probably what got you banned in the first place, and what will keep getting you punished and banned in the future.

> [{quoted}](name=LE4GUE0FDR4VEN,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=WhUZz4jo,comment-id=00090000000000000000,timestamp=2017-11-11T00:06:41.088+0000)

Uhhh, no, that's not normal reasonable person talk outside of League.

I don't see where I was talking about your life outside of League of Legends anywhere in my comment. I told you that you were toxic and to look at it from a new angle so you can see and know you were toxic.
Telling someone to kill themselves for any reason is not the answer to anything, but if you want to be simple minded and rage over a video game, that is your problem and will only continue to earn bans on your accounts.

This is just SOME of the problem (I didn't want to bother isolating every piece of this log that was problematic). This log is 100% reportable, and would probably get you a near-instant 10-25 game chat restriction on a level 30 account. New accounts are watched a little harder specifically to prevent toxic players starting new accounts with the same behavior.

Adjust your behavior, or more bans are in your future no matter your account. This behavior will not get past the system.
This post is nearly a year old. Do not necro old posts.
100% bannable.
I don't see anything wrong with the chat logs

thank you!!! the riot system needs to be fixed this is 50% toxic

Snowflakes are people who can't manage their emotions. Literally all of his log is him complaining about something. If he's too much of a snowflake to play well with others because he feels threatened, he shouldn't play the game.
Something that may not seem toxic to you can still be toxic to the system and rules. Do you have chat logs you can post? Were you using offensive language/racial slurs?

dude its not even me being toxic anymore its just people who don't like me and will report me for the hell of it.. the last account I had I literally didn't say anything toxic whatsoever and still received a ban.. not even a chat restrict I just want to know if I'm ip banned and if I can keep playing again so..

you aren't ip banned, they don't do that and:

How are we supposed to know why you get banned?

Show us some chatlogs and we will happily explain it.

Though I can sum up why you keep getting banned in  two words without any chatlogs as well:

You're toxic.

Point made.
I'm going to guess that you're saying zero tolerance words, because that seems to be the primary way to skip the chat restrictions straight to a ban for just one game.

They don't do IP bans because it will unintentionally target the wrong people, so for example they might accidentally ban a whole house, building, or university/college campus with an IP ban when only one person is supposed to be getting punished.
LMAO says zero tolerance words - thinks hes getting IP banned. Come on dude.
Low quality bait post. Pretty sure I saw this a week ago.

Well, the good news is that you can keep playing and are not IP banned.  The bad news is that you will keep getting banned if you keep telling your team they are autistic, retarded, idiots, or telling them to kys.  Hate speech and instructing people to self harm are not "mildly toxic."  They are highly toxic.  Immediate 14 day or permanent bans are issued for any sort of racism, homophobia, slurs based on mental illness, or instructions to self-harm.  Riot has a zero-tolerance policy towards them.

You can keep playing. I'd advise you not buy any skins if you intend on using hate speech, profanity, death threats and calls for self-mutilation because you will 100% get banned before level 30. You're free to make as many accounts as you want and get them banned, if you so choose. I'd advise you to seek out self-muting programs that replace your enter key or to learn to just not say anything, or at least tone it down. Getting mad is totally acceptable if you don't go overboard. For instance, "I'm going to beat you up" and "I'm going to shoot up my school" in real life are handled way differently, regardless of actual threat. Saying "wow, you're bad" now and again won't trigger a punishment. Saying "kys" or anything like that will. Laws were made to protect the interests of the many, so we don't have to watch our backs and fear for our lives like in a lawless society. We can enjoy life more when we don't feel threatened by everything.
Get on and add me in-game I'll fix ya right up my dude.

> [{quoted}](name=LE4GUE0FDR4VEN,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=WhUZz4jo,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2017-11-10T23:38:51.211+0000)
>
> thanks ill try to fix my behavior probably wont though people are always autolocking in blind and we always lose because we either have 2 junglers or 2 top how can u not tilt over that??

Find other ways to express your frustration. Yell, write it in an anger journal, get a stress ball, scream at your computer, etc.

It's really not that hard to not insult, belittle, or harass people. All it takes is a bit of self control to not hit that enter button. If it's not sportsmanlike, don't type it -- and yes, this means not typing "ez ez bg" either.

Also, if you want someone to see a response, I'd recommend using the "Reply" or "Quote" buttons on their post -- the person you're responding to will get an alert, and will know you responded to them.

I doubt they'll tell you anything we can't. 

If you're constantly going straight to 14-day bans on new accounts, that means you're constantly using hate speech. You need to stop doing that. 

You're welcome to share your chat logs provided with your bans if you think the system got it wrong, but I'm pretty sure we already know what they'll contain.
Why? you are toxic and deserve it.

Let me explain to you what has happen, back in before this latest season rito had a lax policy on bans, your chats had to be reviewed by people, and they didn't get you banhammered every time because things were taken in context. Which brings us to right now, where in this last season rito has implemented a policy of autoban bots. They don't care about context, there is no person reviewing your bans, they have a directive where by if there are any words or phrases that are in their toxic log you will automatically get banhammered. So for example lets say you said "this poro needs to gtfo of my way" right? Nothing particularly toxic about that, you aren't aiming it at a person, just a npc right? But if you were reported by someone in that game the autoban bot would pick up the phrase "gtfo" and you would automatically get a banstrike against you. Hence why anytime you say ANYTHING anymore you get banhammered until your account gets banned. I call this policy the "we want everyone to quit league" policy.
and btw if I'm not ip banned why cant I make a new account on my pc but I can on my phone.. it literally wont let me make an account whatsoever on my pc
it wont let me past when I right click it only says "inspect element"
